scripts.start: npm run build && concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch-sass" "npm run watch-js" "netlify dev --port=8888"
scripts.start-test: npm run build-test && concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch-sass" "npm run watch-js-test" "netlify dev --port=8888"
scripts.build: npm run copy && npm run build-js && npm run build-sass
scripts.build-test: npm run copy && npm run build-js-test && npm run build-sass
scripts.build-js-test: browserify -p esmify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV test ] -t uglifyify --debug src/index.js > public/bundle.js
scripts.build-js: browserify -p esmify -t envify -t uglifyify --debug src/index.js > public/bundle.js
scripts.copy: mkdir -p public && cp src/index.html src/_redirects public
scripts.watch-js: watchify -t envify -t uglifyify --debug -p esmify src/index.js -o public/bundle.js
scripts.watch-js-test: watchify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV test ] -t uglifyify --debug -p esmify src/index.js -o public/bundle.js
